channel.title: David Crowder Band on d:tour

item.title: Sometimes
item.description: Sometimes, in the quiet of her room, A girl with long ginger hair, like a bloom, Felt the weight of the world, pressing down on her soul, Wondering if she’d ever find a way to be whole. Her extensions, a cascade of fire, so bright, Reflected her spirit, her inner fight. She’d look in the mirror, and sometimes she’d cry, Feeling like she’d never understand why. Sometimes every one of us feels
